title: DDoS!
body:
Gooday folks
I just played a game where I just minded my own business and out of nowhere my game froze which made my computer go down. Rebooted and tried to go on league again. As soon as it shows the League logo it says "Files corrupted" and that all the time until the game was over! Suddenly I can log in again. I swear that is some kind of ddos, and I wanna ask if someone else had that before. It happend to a friend once  before so I wonder if we are the only one's >:((( 
~LJoshA

replies.body:
Hello LJoshA,

it doesn't looks like a DDoS. It looks like you game save got an error when your game starts. When you get DDoS you normaly just get a high ping or "attempting to reconnect". I'm sorry that you got this problem at your last game and hope it dosen't happend again.

All the best
TheLuxorus
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
